---
title: "Look what you made me do with {ggplot2} "
format: html
---

## load packages

```{r}
#| warning: false
library(taylor)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


## define some variables
```{r}
df <- taylor::taylor_album_songs |> 
    mutate(single = ifelse(is.na(single_release), 'No', "Yes"))


```

## Does Taylor Swift release singles that are more danceable?

```{r}
#| warning: false
df |> 
    ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x=danceability, y =single)) +
    geom_boxplot()
```
